game.template.elements

Class WallNut

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.template.elements.WallNut
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card, Images

    public class WallNut
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card, Images
    This class controls the time of showing card of wall nut and showing it. Sets all images of wall nut.
